query.text: ----- Initialize Setup -----
Which sim experiments can be loaded?
Load data from Experiments 1, 2, 3 and 4
Load semantic map
Visualize semantic map
----- Queries on Simulation Data -----

query.q: simact_contact('Pancake1', Event, knowrob:'Cup', Obj), simact_start(Exp, Event,Start), simact_end(Exp, Event, End).
query.text: In which contact intervals was the Cup involved during experiment 1?
Which instances of Cups being lifted are available?

query.q: findall(StartTime, simlift_liftonly(Exp,knowrob:'Cup',StartTime,EndTime), Starts), findall(EndTime, simlift_liftonly(Exp,knowrob:'Cup',StartTime,EndTime), Ends), add_avg_trajectory('Cup', Starts, Ends, 10, 1).
query.text: Show the average trajectory of Cups being lifted for all available experiments

query.q: nb_setval(counter,0x0000ff), simlift_liftonly(Exp, knowrob:'Cup', Start, End), add_count(0x404000), add_trajectory('Cup', Start, End, 0.5,3), nb_getval(counter,Val), highlight_trajectory('Cup', Start, End, Val).
query.text: Show the individual trajectories of Cups being lifted for all available experiments
In which experiments did flipping occur?

query.q: simflipping('Pancake1', Object,Tool,Target,ToolGrasped, ToolContactObject, ObjectLifted, ObjectFlipped, ToolReleased), add_trajectory('Spatula', ToolGrasped, ToolReleased, 0.5,3).
query.text: Show the trajectory of the Spatula for the flipping interval during experiment 1

query.q: simflipping('Pancake1',_,_,_,ToolGrasped, ToolContactObject, ObjectLifted, ObjectFlipped, ToolReleased), highlight_trajectory('Spatula', ToolContactObject, ObjectFlipped, 'ff0000').
query.text: Highlight the trajectory of the Spatula while it's in contact with the Pancake

query.q: simflipping('Pancake1',_,_,_,ToolGrasped, ToolContactObject, ObjectLifted, ObjectFlipped, ToolReleased), highlight_trajectory('Spatula', ObjectFlipped, ToolReleased, 'ff8000').
query.text: Highlight the trajectory of the Spatula after flipping the Pancake

query.q: simlift_liftonly('Pancake4', knowrob:'Cup', Start, End), highlight_trajectory('Cup', Start, End, '0080ff').
query.text: Highlight the trajectory of the Cup in experiment 4

query.q: simflip_full('Pancake1', knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, 0.2,2).
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Pancake during flipping in experiment 1

query.q: simflip_fliponly('Pancake1', knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), highlight_trajectory('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, '00FF00').
query.text: Highlight trajectory of the Pancake while it's on the Spatula in experiment 1
Clear canvas
----- Logfile Statistics -----
Initialize diagram canvas

query.q: rdf_has(_, knowrob:'experimentName', literal(type(_, Expname))), string_concat(Expname, ' Timeline', Title), findall(Type, (simact(E,T), rdf_split_url(_,Type,T)), X), sim_timeline_val(X, Times), add_diagram(diagram_id2, 'Title', timeline, 'Time', 'Events', 300, 300, '12px', [[['X'],['Times']]]).
query.text: Show event timeline in the chart
